basics.name: Eduardo García Cortez
basics.label: Data Scientist
basics.summary: I am currently a fifth-semester student pursuing a bachelor’s in data science at ITAM, maintaining a grade average of 9.88/10.

awards.title: Highest Grade Average Award
awards.summary: Awarded for achieving the highest grade average of Data Science.

projects.name: ITAM Makers Lab
projects.summary: Developed a prototype of an online video game to enhance the interactivity of Plato's "Crito" dialogue.
highlights: Used node-based game design, with Twine.

projects.name: Hackaton ITAM
projects.summary: My team of three won first place at the ITAM Hackathon focused on cybersecurity.
highlights: Developed and presented a prototype app using a bloom filter to verify the safety of QR code links.
Worked in a team of three.

projects.name: Analysis of National Fishing Industry in Mexico
projects.summary: Explored and analyzed national data on aquatic animals captured and raised across Mexico, identifying and visualizing patterns for the period 2020-2022.
